.first-menu,.second-menu
	position: absolute
	width: 100%
	top: 106px
.button_logo
	background-color: $blackLight
	margin-bottom: 1px
	cursor: pointer
$(function(){
	var grid = $('.grid');
	grid.packery();
	grid.find('.blog-grid').hoverdir({hoverElem:'.site-descr'});		

	var clipboard = new Clipboard('.btn-сlipboard');
	clipboard.on('success', function(e) {
		console.log(e);
	});										
}());
